Q1. Consider the following inverted index:
(904, 17), (1468, 255), (2440, 300), (3568, 127)
Compress using
(A) VarInt
(B) Simple 9
(C) Bit-Aligned
methods.
Q2 (NO CREDIT)
VarInt encode/decode programming.
Start with varInt for students.
Good luck

(904, 17), (564, 255), (972, 300), (1128, 127)
(A)
00000111100010001001000100000010010110100000000011111111100000111110011000000001010101100000010001110100001111111

(B)
00010000111000100000000000010001000100001000110100000000111111110001000011110011000000010010110000010001000110100000000001111111

(C)
